name: ID Card
description:
Update: 8/3/2018

Well, it has been a little while since I've updated this. Sorry about that. Anyway, I'm on the last stretch of this story. I've finished the main plot (the top choice for every action) and the interesting mall choice. Hopefully the next update will be sooner. I plan on finishing these stories next:

  1. Gina
  2. Pregnant
  3. Beach

I actually want to start a new game after this one with the things I've learned. Thank you for being patient with me and for those who donated without being prompted. You guys are the best.

-------

Places to reach me:

  • Deviant Art (https://thextra89.deviantart.com/)
  • Twitter (https://twitter.com/theXtra89) - I'll try to be more active here and post everything I do
  • YouTube (https://www.youtube.com/user/mangatransformation)
  • Website (http://www.thextrapath.com)
